passives.name: Skipper
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] against any enemy grant a stack for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. At '''maximum''' stacks, or 4 stacks, your next basic attack against a champion, epic monster, or structure consumes all stacks to deal {{as|{{rd|120%|{{ap|120*0.7}}%}} '''base''' AD|ad}} {{as|(+ {{rd|5%|{{ap|5*0.7}}%}} '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, increased to {{as|{{rd|300%|{{ap|300*0.7}}%}} '''base''' AD|ad}} {{as|(+ {{rd|10%|{{ap|10*0.7}}%}} '''maximum''' health)}} against structures.

passives.name: Boarding Party
passives.effects: Allied {{ui|Blue Siege Minion|link=Siege minion|siege minions}} and {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link=Super minion|super minions}} within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} {{tt|1050|Estimated}} units gain {{rd|70 to 130 for 11|70*0.5 to 130*0.5 for 11|levels=1;9 to 18|pp=true}} {{as|'''bonus''' armor}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}, as well as 10% increased size.
